_meta.description: Complete Penance card database v3.5 - All 10 factions now have 21 cards each!

universal.name: Desperate Lunge
universal.effect: Move up to 2 hexes in any direction. You may rotate once during movement. Generate 1 Heat.

universal.name: Warden's Pivot
universal.effect: Rotate to any facing (no limit). Free action - does not cost SP.

universal.name: Ironstrider's Rush
universal.effect: Move up to 3 hexes in straight line. Ignore difficult terrain. Generate 2 Heat.

universal.name: Unyielding Bulwark
universal.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Discard this card after use.

universal.name: Second Skin
universal.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 1 (minimum 1). Discard this card after use.

universal.name: Field Suture
universal.effect: Remove 1 Damage card from target's discard pile from the game. Can target self or adjacent ally.

universal.name: Tattered Hope
universal.effect: Discard your entire hand. Draw 3 cards. Use when desperate or hand is bad.

universal.name: Guardian's Defiance
universal.effect: +2 Defense until your next turn. You may cover adjacent ally (redirect 1 attack to yourself).

church.name: Blood Offering
church.effect: Discard 2 cards from top of your deck (self-harm). Your next attack this turn: +3 damage, ignores 1 Defense, and -1 to target number (easier to hit).

church.name: Martyrdom Protocol
church.effect: When an ally within 2 hexes would take damage, redirect that damage to yourself instead. Gain 1 Heat.

church.name: Righteous Fury
church.effect: Each time an allied Casket is destroyed this mission, gain +1 damage to all attacks permanently for the rest of the mission (stacks).

church.name: Consecrated Ground
church.effect: Create a 3-hex radius healing zone centered on you until end of round. Allied Caskets in this zone recover 2 cards from discard pile at start of their turn.

church.name: Last Rites
church.effect: When an allied Casket within 3 hexes is destroyed (deck reaches 0), immediately recover 5 cards from your discard pile and draw 2 cards.

church.name: Righteous Wrath
church.effect: Deal 5 damage. This attack cannot miss. If target has killed an ally this mission, deal 7 damage instead.

church.name: Divine Judgment
church.effect: Deal 8 damage, ignore 1 Defense. On Miss: Recover 2 SP and gain 'Judgment Delayed' (+3 damage to next attack).

church.name: Flagellant's Zeal
church.effect: Gain 5 SP immediately. Can only be used once per mission. Gain 2 Heat.

church.name: Absolution
church.effect: Remove 3 Heat. Recover 3 cards from discard pile to deck (shuffle). Absolve your sins.

church.name: Chains of Penance
church.effect: Deal 4 damage. Target cannot move until end of their next turn. Discard 1 card from your deck (self-harm).

church.name: Divine Guidance
church.effect: Until end of turn, all your attacks gain +1 accuracy (reduce target number by 1). Your next attack this turn cannot miss (5+ becomes 4+, etc).

church.name: Martyrdom's Certainty
church.effect: Discard 1 card from deck. Your next attack cannot miss (auto-hit) but deals -2 damage.

church.name: Zealot's Focus
church.effect: Reroll 1 Attack Die on your next attack this turn.

church.name: Point-Blank Execution
church.effect: Deal 6 damage. This attack cannot miss. If attacking from rear arc (hex 4), deal 8 damage instead.

church.name: Confession Under Duress
church.effect: Target enemy's next attack: +2 to target number (harder for them to hit). Draw 1 card.

church.name: Holy Smite
church.effect: Deal 5 damage. If you've discarded cards this turn (via Blood Offering or other effects), deal 7 damage instead.

church.name: Judgment Strike
church.effect: Deal 4 damage. If target has killed an ally this mission, deal 6 damage instead (vengeance).

church.name: Crusader's Wrath
church.effect: Deal 6 damage. Ignore 2 Defense. Discard 1 card to deal +2 damage (total 8).

church.name: Martyr Shield
church.effect: When an ally within 3 hexes is attacked, redirect that attack to yourself. Reduce damage by 2. Ally protection.

church.name: Penance Rune
church.effect: Whenever you discard cards (via Blood Offering, self-harm, etc), gain +1 accuracy on your next attack (reduce target number by 1).

church.name: Faith Armor
church.effect: Once per turn, when you would take damage, reduce that damage by 2. Works even at 0 SP.

dwarves.name: Crushing Blow
dwarves.effect: Deal 4 damage. ARMOR PIERCING (ignore all Defense buffs and armor).

dwarves.name: Forge Fury
dwarves.effect: Deal 3 damage + 1 damage per Heat you currently have (max +6). Remove all Heat after attack resolves.

dwarves.name: Rune of Protection
dwarves.effect: Gain 1 Rune Counter. While you have Rune Counters, reduce all damage by 1 per counter (max 3 counters). Duration: Until end of mission or destroyed.

dwarves.name: Unbreakable
dwarves.effect: When you would take Component Damage, prevent 1 Component Damage. Gain 1 Heat.

dwarves.name: Earthshaker
dwarves.effect: Deal 5 damage to primary target. All adjacent enemies take 2 damage and are pushed 1 hex away.

dwarves.name: Clan Vengeance
dwarves.effect: Each time you take Component Damage, your next attack deals +2 damage. This bonus stacks (3 Component Damage = +6 damage on next attack).

dwarves.name: Ironborn Resilience
dwarves.effect: Passive: The first Component Damage you take each round is ignored. You are Ironborn.

dwarves.name: Mountain Stance
dwarves.effect: Gain +3 Defense until your next turn. You cannot move while in Mountain Stance. Immovable as stone.

dwarves.name: Grudge Bearer
dwarves.effect: Passive: Mark enemies who damage you. Attacks against marked enemies deal +2 damage. The grudge is eternal.

dwarves.name: Ancestor Ward
dwarves.effect: When you would take lethal damage (deck would reach 0), prevent up to 5 damage. Once per mission. The ancestors protect.

dwarves.name: War Pick Strike
dwarves.effect: Deal 4 damage. This attack ignores armor (armor-piercing). Basic Dwarven attack.

dwarves.name: Warhammer Crush
dwarves.effect: Deal 5 damage. This attack ignores armor. If target is adjacent to terrain, deal 6 damage (slam into wall).

dwarves.name: Forge Hammer Smash
dwarves.effect: Deal 6 damage. This attack ignores armor. Generate 2 Heat. If you have 3+ Heat, deal 8 damage instead.

dwarves.name: Battle Axe Cleave
dwarves.effect: Deal 5 damage to primary target. Deal 2 damage to one adjacent enemy (cleave). Both attacks ignore armor.

dwarves.name: Earthshaker Slam
dwarves.effect: Deal 8 damage. This attack ignores armor. All enemies within 2 hexes must roll Defense Dice or be knocked prone (lose 1 movement next turn).

dwarves.name: Ancestral Rune Blade
dwarves.effect: Deal 3 damage. This attack ignores armor. If you have 1+ Rune Counters, deal 5 damage instead.

dwarves.name: Forge-Rune Sigil
dwarves.effect: Whenever you generate Heat, deal 1 damage to target enemy within 3 hexes. Dwarven-exclusive sigil.

dwarves.name: Runic Aegis
dwarves.effect: When attacked, gain 1 Rune Counter (max 3). Reduce damage from this attack by 1. Defensive sigil.

dwarves.name: Molten Core Plating
dwarves.effect: You can have up to 12 Heat before overheating (instead of 10). Heat Sink equipment.

dwarves.name: Mountain Stance
dwarves.effect: Until end of turn, you cannot be moved or knocked back by enemy effects. Reduce all damage taken by 2.

dwarves.name: Grudge Mark
dwarves.effect: Mark target enemy. You deal +2 damage to marked enemy. Mark lasts until enemy dies or you mark different target. Record grudges.

ossuarium.name: Soul Harvest
ossuarium.effect: Deal 4 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt from your discard pile (max 4 cards).

ossuarium.name: Corpse Fuel
ossuarium.effect: When an enemy Casket is destroyed within 3 hexes, immediately recover 5 cards from your discard pile and shuffle into deck.

ossuarium.name: Phylactery
ossuarium.effect: The first time each mission you would be reduced to 0 HP, instead set HP to 5 (recover 5 cards from discard pile). This is automatic and costs nothing.

ossuarium.name: Bone Scythe Reap
ossuarium.effect: Deal 3 damage to primary target and 2 damage to all adjacent enemies. Recover 1 card from discard pile per enemy damaged (max 4 cards).

ossuarium.name: Deathless Advance
ossuarium.effect: Move up to 3 hexes. Until end of your turn, you cannot take more than 5 damage from any single attack (damage cap).

ossuarium.name: Necrotic Surge
ossuarium.effect: Whenever you recover cards from discard pile (via any effect), recover +1 additional card.

ossuarium.name: Grave Pact
ossuarium.effect: Discard 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, deal 2 damage to target enemy within 6 hexes (total 6 damage). Recover 3 cards at end of your next turn.

ossuarium.name: Death Mark
ossuarium.effect: Mark target enemy. While marked, whenever you damage that enemy, recover 1 additional card. Lasts until enemy dies or until you mark a different target.

ossuarium.name: Reanimate
ossuarium.effect: Place a Skeletal Minion token within 3 hexes. It has 3 HP, 3 Movement, deals 2 damage melee. Minion acts immediately after your turn. Lasts until destroyed.

ossuarium.name: Siphon Essence
ossuarium.effect: Deal 2 damage. Recover cards equal to half the damage dealt (rounded up). Can target at range unlike most lifesteal.

ossuarium.name: Bone Scythe Swing
ossuarium.effect: Deal 4 damage. Recover 2 cards from discard pile (lifesteal). Basic Ossuarium attack.

ossuarium.name: Death Grasp
ossuarium.effect: Deal 3 damage at extended range. Recover 1 card from discard pile. Ranged drain.

ossuarium.name: Soul Rend
ossuarium.effect: Deal 5 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt (max 5). Powerful lifesteal.

ossuarium.name: Corpse Explosion
ossuarium.effect: Deal 3 damage to target and all adjacent enemies (AoE). Recover 1 card per enemy damaged (max 4).

ossuarium.name: Drain Life
ossuarium.effect: Deal 6 damage at range. Recover 6 cards from discard pile (100% lifesteal). Massive drain.

ossuarium.name: Necrotic Touch
ossuarium.effect: Deal 2 damage. Recover 2 cards. If this kills the target, recover 5 cards total instead.

ossuarium.name: Vampiric Rune
ossuarium.effect: Whenever you deal damage, recover +1 additional card from discard pile. Ossuarium-exclusive sigil.

ossuarium.name: Bone Armor
ossuarium.effect: When attacked, reduce damage by 2. If you blocked 2+ damage this way, recover 1 card.

ossuarium.name: Soul Well
ossuarium.effect: At start of your turn, if you have 5 or fewer cards in hand, recover 1 card from discard pile. Safety net.

ossuarium.name: Death Shroud
ossuarium.effect: Until end of turn, whenever you recover cards from discard pile, recover +2 additional cards. Amplifies all lifesteal.

ossuarium.name: Corpse Shield
ossuarium.effect: When an enemy within 3 hexes dies, gain +3 Defense until end of your next turn. Corpse empowerment.

elves.name: Thorn Strike
elves.effect: Deal 3 damage. Apply Bleed 2 (target takes 2 damage at start of their next turn).

elves.name: Pruning Cut
elves.effect: Deal 4 damage to specific component (you choose: Right Arm, Left Arm, Legs, Head, Chassis). If target discards cards from that component type, deal +2 Component Damage.

elves.name: Root Bind
elves.effect: Target enemy cannot move until end of their next turn. If they attempt to move, take 3 damage and Bleed 1.

elves.name: Photosynthesis
elves.effect: At end of your turn, if you did NOT attack this turn, recover 1 card from discard pile and remove 1 Heat.

elves.name: Leaf Dance
elves.effect: Move up to 3 hexes. You may make 1 attack during this movement (at any point). After attacking, you may continue moving.

elves.name: Verdant Regeneration
elves.effect: At the start of each round, recover 1 card from discard pile. If you have Living Seal equipped, recover 2 cards instead.

elves.name: Nature's Wrath
elves.effect: Deal 6 damage to target. All enemies adjacent to target take 2 damage. Nature answers the call.

elves.name: Wild Growth
elves.effect: Create difficult terrain in 3 adjacent hexes. Enemies moving through take 1 damage per hex. Lasts 2 rounds.

elves.name: Sylvan Step
elves.effect: Teleport up to 4 hexes. Must end in or adjacent to terrain. Once per turn. The forest guides you.

elves.name: Eternal Vigil
elves.effect: Passive: At the end of each round, if no enemies are within 3 hexes, recover 1 card from discard. The patient hunter endures.

elves.name: Thorn Blade Slash
elves.effect: Deal 3 damage. Apply Bleed 2 (target takes 2 damage at start of their turn). Basic Elven attack.

elves.name: Vine Whip Lash
elves.effect: Deal 2 damage. Apply Bleed 1. Extended reach attack (2 hexes).

elves.name: Leaf Blade Flurry
elves.effect: Attack twice for 2 damage each (total 4 damage). Each hit applies Bleed 1. Rapid strikes.

elves.name: Surgical Cut
elves.effect: Deal 3 damage to specific component. Apply Bleed 2. Add +1 Component Damage if target discards that component type.

elves.name: Barbed Arrow Volley
elves.effect: Deal 3 damage at range. Apply Bleed 3. If target already has Bleed counters, apply +1 additional Bleed (max 4 total).

elves.name: Venom Strike
elves.effect: Deal 2 damage. Apply Bleed 3 (poisoned blade). Enemies with 5+ Bleed take +2 damage from this attack.

elves.name: Toxin Mastery
elves.effect: All Bleed effects you apply deal double damage. Bleed 1 becomes Bleed 2, Bleed 2 becomes Bleed 4, etc. Elven-exclusive sigil.

elves.name: Leaf Cloak
elves.effect: When attacked, move up to 2 hexes immediately after attack resolves. Reactive dodge.

elves.name: Photosynthesis Pendant
elves.effect: At start of your turn, recover 1 card from discard pile. Passive regeneration.

elves.name: Hunter's Focus
elves.effect: Your next attack this turn deals +2 damage to enemies that have Bleed counters on them. Amplifies Bleed builds.

elves.name: Nature's Stride
elves.effect: Move up to 4 hexes. Ignore difficult terrain. Elven movement sigil.

equipment.name: Righteous Slash
equipment.effect: Deal 4 damage. +1 if target damaged this round.

equipment.name: Buckler Block
equipment.effect: Reactive: Reduce damage by 1, draw 1 card.

equipment.name: Earthquake
equipment.effect: 4 damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

equipment.name: Bulwark
equipment.effect: Reactive: -2 damage to you and ally.

equipment.name: Opportunist Strike
equipment.effect: 5 damage if target moved this turn.

church.name: Divine Guidance
church.effect: Your next attack this turn: -2 to target number (easier to hit). If it hits, apply 'Blessed' status to target (all allies' attacks against this target: -1 to target number until end of round).

church.name: Martyrdom's Certainty
church.effect: Discard 1 card from deck. Your next attack cannot miss (auto-hit) but deals -2 damage.

church.name: Zealot's Focus
church.effect: Reroll 1 Attack Die on your next attack this turn.

taint_exploitation.name: Tainted Fury
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 2 Taint Markers: Your next attack this turn deals +2 damage. Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Ignore Pain
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 3 Taint Markers: Reduce next damage taken by 3 (before Defense roll). Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Void Step
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 Taint Marker: Move 2 hexes (costs 0 SP). Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Exposed Weakness
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 enemy Taint Marker: Gain Advantage on your next attack against that enemy (roll 3 Attack Dice, take 2 highest).

taint_exploitation.name: Force Reroll
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 2 enemy Taint Markers: Force target to reroll up to 2 successful Defense Dice.

taint_exploitation.name: Heat Spike
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 enemy Taint Marker: Target gains +1 Heat immediately.

taint_exploitation.name: Taint Overload
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 5 enemy Taint Markers: Target immediately flips 1 Pilot Wound card (neural feedback).

taint_exploitation.name: Flagellant's Zeal (Taint)
taint_exploitation.effect: Discard 3 cards (self-harm), gain 2 Taint Markers. Gain +2 SP this turn only (temporary burst).

taint_exploitation.name: Decay Aura
taint_exploitation.effect: Enemies within 3 hexes gain +1 Taint per turn (passive corruption radiation).

taint_exploitation.name: Regeneration Purge
taint_exploitation.effect: Recover 2 cards from discard pile. Remove 1 Taint Marker.

grit_related.name: Iron Will Training
grit_related.effect: Once per mission: When you would fail a Grit Check, reroll it. If you still fail, gain +1 Grit permanently (trauma builds character).

grit_related.name: Grit Your Teeth
grit_related.effect: When you take Pilot Damage: Add +2 to your Grit Check roll for this damage only.

grit_related.name: Martyr's Endurance
grit_related.effect: When you use Blood Offering or other self-harm Church cards: Gain +1 to your next Grit Check this mission.

grit_related.name: Stone Endurance Boost
grit_related.effect: Until end of mission: +1 to all Grit Checks (not just vs Severe Injuries). Gain 1 Heat.

support_units.name: Field Medic
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally recovers 2 cards from discard pile. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Field Engineer
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally removes 2 Heat. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Spotter
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Passive: Allies within 6 hexes ignore Disadvantage from cover. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Confessor
support_units.effect: Support Unit (2 HP, 0 attack). Passive: Allies within 2 hexes gain +1 to Grit Checks. Can redirect 1 attack per turn to self (martyr).

support_units.name: Forge Priest
support_units.effect: Support Unit (2 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally gains 1 Rune Counter. Passive: Remove 1 Heat from adjacent allies at end of round.

support_units.name: Bone Servant
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 1 attack). Action: Deal 1 damage to target. Passive: When destroyed, owner recovers 3 cards from discard.

support_units.name: Ent Sapling
support_units.effect: Support Unit (3 HP, 2 attack). Action: Deal 2 damage to adjacent enemy. Passive: Owner recovers 1 card at start of each round while Ent alive.

nomads.name: Ghost Step
nomads.effect: After making an attack, move up to 2 hexes (free action). Hit and run. Strike from shadows.

nomads.name: Survivor's Instinct
nomads.effect: Passive: When your deck has 15 cards or fewer, gain +1 SP maximum. Desperation fuels survival.

nomads.name: Scavenger's Cunning
nomads.effect: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards of your choice. Dig for what you need.

nomads.name: Smoke and Mirrors
nomads.effect: Create smoke in your current hex. Blocks LOS. Move 2 hexes (does not break stealth). Vanish.

nomads.name: Opportunist
nomads.effect: Passive: Attacks against enemies who moved this turn deal +2 damage. Strike when vulnerable.

nomads.name: Desperate Gamble
nomads.effect: Discard 3 cards from deck. Your next attack deals +5 damage and ignores all Defense. All or nothing.

nomads.name: Wolves' Pact
nomads.effect: Passive: When adjacent to 2+ allies, gain +1 damage to all attacks. The pack hunts together.

nomads.name: Scrapper
nomads.effect: When you destroy an enemy Casket, immediately draw 2 cards and recover 2 cards from discard. Salvage the wreckage.

nomads.name: Feint and Strike
nomads.effect: Deal 5 damage. After attacking, move 1 hex. Quick, precise, gone.

nomads.name: Winds of Change
nomads.effect: Shuffle your discard pile back into your deck. Reset. Adapt. Survive.

nomads.name: Quick Slash
nomads.effect: Deal 3 damage. Fast, efficient, reliable.

nomads.name: Pistol Shot
nomads.effect: Deal 3 damage at range. Keep your distance.

nomads.name: Hit and Run
nomads.effect: Deal 4 damage. After attack resolves, move up to 2 hexes.

nomads.name: Opportunist Strike
nomads.effect: Deal 5 damage if target moved during their last turn. Otherwise deals 3 damage.

nomads.name: Dual Wield
nomads.effect: Make two attacks: 3 damage melee to adjacent target, then 3 damage ranged to target within 4 hexes. Can target same enemy twice.

nomads.name: Reckless Slash
nomads.effect: Deal 6 damage. Discard 1 card. Move up to 1 hex after attack.

nomads.name: Smoke Bomb
nomads.effect: Target hex becomes smoke terrain (blocks line of sight). Lasts until end of round.

nomads.name: Grappling Hook
nomads.effect: Move up to 3 hexes in straight line, ignoring all terrain and obstacles. Cannot move through enemies.

nomads.name: Flash Grenade
nomads.effect: Deal 2 damage. Target has -1 to their next attack roll.

nomads.name: Adaptive Armor
nomads.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 1 (minimum 1). After damage resolves, move 1 hex in any direction.

nomads.name: Scavenge
nomads.effect: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. Sort through the wreckage.

crucible.name: Living Forge
crucible.effect: Passive: At the start of your turn, if you are standing in Lava Terrain (or within 1 hex of fire), gain 1 Forge token. **Bonus:** Gain 2 Forge tokens instead if you are standing directly in lava. Fire sustains us.
crucible.lore: The volcano provides. We do not fear the flame.

crucible.name: Honor Duel
crucible.effect: Challenge 1 visible enemy to Honor Duel. For 1 round, only you and target enemy can attack each other (all other units are ignored). If you kill target, gain 3 Forge tokens and recover 3 cards. If target refuses duel, they gain "Coward's Mark" (all Crucible attacks against them deal +2 damage permanently this mission). Binding challenge.
crucible.lore: Face me. Or be branded craven.

crucible.name: Volcanic Tremor
crucible.effect: Create earthquake. All enemies in area take 2 damage and are knocked down (skip movement next turn). Create 1 Lava Terrain hex at center of area (remains for 3 turns). Summon the volcano's wrath.

crucible.name: Ancestral Iron
crucible.effect: Passive: At the end of each mission, you may spend 5 Forge tokens to forge 1 Ancestral Weapon (choose: +1 damage permanently to all attacks, OR +1 Defense permanently, OR +1 movement permanently). Ancestral Weapons persist across missions (permanent upgrades). Can have up to 3 Ancestral Weapons total. Legacy of fire.
crucible.lore: What we forge endures. Our steel outlives us.

crucible.name: Pack Fury
crucible.effect: Until end of round, gain +1 damage to all attacks for each enemy within 6 hexes (max +3 damage). Outnumbered, never outfought. Desperate strength.

crucible.name: Magma Veins
crucible.effect: Teleport to any Lava Terrain hex within 8 hexes. Draw 2 cards. Generate 1 Heat. Ride the underground rivers.
crucible.lore: We walk the forge-paths. Fire is our road.

crucible.name: Forge Blessing
crucible.effect: Play when you take damage. Reduce damage by 3 (minimum 1). If standing in lava, reduce by 5 instead. The forge shields us.
crucible.lore: Fire hardens steel. Pain hardens us.

crucible.name: Coward's Brand
crucible.effect: Deal 3 damage. If target has "Coward's Mark" (from refusing Honor Duel), deal 6 damage instead and they cannot use defense cards this turn. Punish dishonor.
crucible.lore: Cowards die twice. First in spirit, then in flesh.

crucible.name: Emberforged Strike
crucible.effect: Deal 5 damage. Spend 2 Forge tokens to deal 7 damage and set target on fire (2 damage at start of their next turn). Molten fury.
crucible.lore: Our steel burns with the forge's rage.

crucible.name: Last Stand
crucible.effect: Play when your deck reaches 5 cards or fewer. Until end of round, gain +3 damage to all attacks and +2 Defense. Cannot retreat (movement locked to 0). Die where you stand. Once per mission.
crucible.lore: Here I stand. Here I fall. But never do I run.

crucible.name: Hammer Strike
crucible.effect: Deal 3 damage. If standing in lava, deal 4 damage instead.

crucible.name: Volcanic Slash
crucible.effect: Deal 4 damage. If you have 3+ Forge tokens, deal 5 damage instead.

crucible.name: Lava Leap
crucible.effect: Move up to 3 hexes toward target (must end adjacent), then deal 4 damage. If you move through lava, deal 5 damage instead.

crucible.name: Forge-Fury
crucible.effect: Deal 6 damage. Gain 1 Heat. Spend 2 Forge tokens to deal 8 damage instead. Uncontrolled power.

crucible.name: Ashen King's Wrath
crucible.effect: Deal 6 damage. If outnumbered (2+ enemies within 6 hexes), deal 8 damage instead. Desperate strength.

crucible.name: Component Sunder
crucible.effect: Deal 5 damage to specific component (choose: Right Arm, Left Arm, Legs, Head, Chassis). Spend 2 Forge tokens to deal 7 damage instead. Precision destruction.

crucible.name: Lava Flask
crucible.effect: Throw flask of lava. Deal 2 damage and create 1 Lava Terrain hex at target location (lasts 2 turns). Portable volcano.

crucible.name: Ember Shield
crucible.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Spend 1 Forge token to reduce by 4 instead. Molten defense.

crucible.name: Ash Cloak
crucible.effect: Draw 2 cards. If standing in lava, draw 3 cards instead. Ash obscures, fire reveals.

crucible.name: Forge Call
crucible.effect: Gain 2 Forge tokens immediately. Generate 1 Heat. Summon the forge's blessing.

crucible.name: Duelist's Stance
crucible.effect: Until end of turn, your melee attacks deal +2 damage but you take +1 damage from all sources. High-risk aggression.

emergent.name: Hive-Mind Link
emergent.effect: Passive: When an allied Emergent Syndicate Casket within 4 hexes plays a card, you may spend 1 Metamorph token to copy that card's effect (reduced effectiveness: half damage/healing). The hive thinks as one.
emergent.lore: Individual thoughts merge into collective purpose.

emergent.name: Metamorphic Adaptation
emergent.effect: Transform into one of three forms until end of round. Choose: [1] Assault Form (+2 damage to all attacks, -1 Defense), [2] Tank Form (+3 Defense, -1 movement), [3] Scout Form (+2 movement, ignore terrain). Transformations are cumulative if you have multiple Metamorph tokens.
emergent.lore: Our bodies are tools. We reshape them as needed.

emergent.name: Exoskeleton Molt
emergent.effect: Play when you take damage. Reduce damage by 3 (minimum 1). Recover 2 cards from discard pile (shedding damaged tissue). Generate 1 Heat. Once per round.
emergent.lore: Shed the damaged shell. Emerge stronger.

emergent.name: Pheromone Command
emergent.effect: Release pheromone cloud (visible colored mist). All allied Emergent Syndicate Caskets within range gain +1 damage and +1 SP this turn. Enemies within range have -1 to hit (confused by pheromones).

emergent.name: Segmented Strike
emergent.effect: Deal 4 damage with primary limbs. If you have 2+ Metamorph tokens, make a second attack with additional arthropod limbs for 2 damage. Multi-limb advantage.
emergent.lore: Four arms strike where two would fail.

emergent.name: Swarm Intelligence
emergent.effect: Passive: Gain +1 Metamorph token at the start of each round. If 3+ allied Emergent Syndicate Caskets are within 4 hexes, gain +2 tokens instead. The collective grows stronger.
emergent.lore: Proximity breeds power. Unity breeds evolution.

emergent.name: Chrysalis Rebirth
emergent.effect: When your deck reaches 5 cards or fewer, spend 5 Metamorph tokens to enter Chrysalis state for 1 turn (cannot act). Next turn, recover 10 cards from discard pile, remove all Heat, gain +2 Defense permanently this mission. Metamorphosis completes. Once per mission.
emergent.lore: We do not die. We transform.

emergent.name: Compound Vision
emergent.effect: Passive: You can see in 360° (cannot be flanked). Attacks against you from behind do not gain bonuses. Your compound eyes miss nothing.
emergent.lore: We see all angles. Ambush is impossible.

emergent.name: Mandible Rend
emergent.effect: Deal 3 damage. Target has -1 Defense until end of their next turn (armor shredded by mandibles). If target is adjacent to another ally, deal 4 damage instead.
emergent.lore: Our jaws crack steel like chitin.

emergent.name: Collective Consciousness
emergent.effect: Choose 1 allied Emergent Syndicate Casket within range. They immediately draw 2 cards and gain 1 Metamorph token. Share knowledge through the hive.

emergent.name: Mantis Strikes
emergent.effect: Deal 3 damage with blade-like mantis limbs. Basic melee attack.

emergent.name: Chitin Claws
emergent.effect: Deal 4 damage. If you have Assault Form active (from Metamorphic Adaptation), deal 5 damage instead.

emergent.name: Segmented Lash
emergent.effect: Deal 3 damage at extended range (segmented limb extends). Can hit targets 2 hexes away.

emergent.name: Multi-Limb Barrage
emergent.effect: Attack three times with different limbs for 2 damage each (total 6). Can split damage among up to 3 adjacent targets. Arthropod advantage.

emergent.name: Arthropod Fury
emergent.effect: Deal 6 damage. Spend 1 Metamorph token to deal 8 damage instead. Evolutionary power.

emergent.name: Precision Strikes
emergent.effect: Deal 5 damage to specific component (you choose: Right Arm, Left Arm, Legs, Head, Chassis). Compound eyes guide surgical strikes.

emergent.name: Pheromone Glands
emergent.effect: Release confusion pheromones. All enemies in cone have -1 to their next attack roll. Chemical warfare.

emergent.name: Reactive Carapace
emergent.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Spend 1 Metamorph token to reduce by 4 instead. Hardened exoskeleton.

emergent.name: Antenna Sense
emergent.effect: Draw 2 cards. If you have 3+ Metamorph tokens, draw 3 cards instead. Enhanced sensory input.

emergent.name: Metamorph Serum
emergent.effect: Target gains 2 Metamorph tokens immediately. Can target self or adjacent Emergent Syndicate ally. Accelerate transformation.

emergent.name: Hivemind Beacon
emergent.effect: Choose 1 allied Emergent Syndicate Casket within range. They immediately move up to 2 hexes toward you. Rally the collective.

exchange.name: War Profiteer
exchange.effect: Passive: When ANY Casket (enemy, ally, or neutral) is destroyed within 6 hexes of you, gain 2 Credit tokens. **Bonus:** Gain 3 Credits instead if you dealt the killing blow. Profit from chaos.
exchange.lore: Every death is an opportunity. Every corpse a ledger entry.

exchange.name: Hire Mercenary
exchange.effect: Summon 1 Mercenary unit (8 HP, 3 damage, fights for you until destroyed or mission ends). Mercenary appears in target hex (must be unoccupied). Can have up to 2 Mercenaries active simultaneously. Expendable soldiers.
exchange.lore: Loyalty is expensive. Disloyalty is fatal.

exchange.name: Economic Leverage
exchange.effect: Target enemy must choose: [1] Take 4 damage immediately, OR [2] Skip their next turn. Economic ultimatum.
exchange.lore: Pay now or pay later. Either way, you pay.

exchange.name: Market Manipulation
exchange.effect: All enemies in area have +1 SP cost to all cards for 1 turn. Inflation hurts.
exchange.lore: We control the market. You merely survive it.

exchange.name: Hostile Takeover
exchange.effect: Deal 6 damage. If this kills the target, gain 4 Credit tokens and recover 2 cards from discard pile. Liquidate assets.

exchange.name: Insurance Policy
exchange.effect: Play when you would take damage. Negate all damage from this attack. Generate 1 Heat. Once per round. Premium protection.
exchange.lore: We insure everything. For a price.

exchange.name: Bribe
exchange.effect: Target enemy has -2 to their next attack roll and -1 movement this turn. Spend 2 Credit tokens to extend duration to 2 turns. Corruption works.
exchange.lore: Everyone has a price. Even honor.

exchange.name: Contract Enforcement
exchange.effect: All friendly Mercenary units within range gain +2 damage and +2 Defense until end of round. Spend 1 Credit token to extend duration to 2 rounds. Paid professionals perform.
exchange.lore: We pay well. They fight better.

exchange.name: Auction Bid
exchange.effect: Draw X cards (where X = Credits spent, max 5). Spend Credits to buy card advantage.
exchange.lore: Knowledge is power. Power is expensive.

exchange.name: Golden Parachute
exchange.effect: Play when your deck reaches 5 cards or fewer. Immediately recover 8 cards from discard pile, remove all Heat, gain +1 Defense permanently this mission. Once per mission. Executive bail-out.

exchange.name: Ledger Strike
exchange.effect: Deal 3 damage. If you have 3+ Credit tokens, deal 4 damage instead (wealth empowers).

exchange.name: Coin Throw
exchange.effect: Deal 2 damage at range. Spend 1 Credit token to deal 4 damage instead (premium ammunition).

exchange.name: Hostile Acquisition
exchange.effect: Deal 5 damage. If target is adjacent to your Mercenary, deal 7 damage instead (coordinated assault).

exchange.name: Buyout Strike
exchange.effect: Deal 6 damage. If this kills the target, immediately summon 1 Mercenary (no Credit cost). Acquire their contracts.

exchange.name: Executive Order
exchange.effect: Deal 4 damage. Target has -2 SP next turn (economic pressure). Authority in action.

exchange.name: Liquidation
exchange.effect: Deal 5 damage to specific component (you choose: Right Arm, Left Arm, Legs, Head, Chassis). Spend 2 Credit tokens to deal 7 damage instead. Precision destruction.

exchange.name: Market Forecast
exchange.effect: Look at top 3 cards of your deck. Rearrange them in any order. Spend 1 Credit token to draw 1 additional card. Insider trading.

exchange.name: Defense Contract
exchange.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Spend 1 Credit token to reduce by 4 instead. Paid protection.

exchange.name: Corporate Espionage
exchange.effect: Look at target enemy's hand (see all their cards). Spend 2 Credit tokens to steal 1 card from their hand and add it to yours. Information warfare.

exchange.name: War Bonds
exchange.effect: Gain 3 Credit tokens immediately. Generate 1 Heat. Investment with interest.

exchange.name: Mercenary Contract
exchange.effect: Target friendly Mercenary immediately moves up to 3 hexes and makes a 3-damage attack. Control your assets.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Vestige Heritage
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Passive: When ANY Casket (enemy, ally, or neutral) is destroyed within 6 hexes of you, gain 2 Biomass tokens. **Bloodline Bonus:** Gain 1 additional Biomass if killed enemy matches your primary bloodline's prey type (Fenmar = kills beasts, Urtok = kills heavy units, Vexis = kills swarms, Corvath = kills scouts, Serrak = kills wounded). The dead fuel evolution.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: Our blood remembers. Our hunger never forgets.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Predator's Mark
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Mark 1 visible enemy as "Prey". Your attacks against Prey deal +2 damage. You can track Prey through concealment/smoke. When Prey is destroyed, recover 3 cards from discard pile. Mark lasts until Prey dies or end of mission.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: I smell fear. I follow blood. I do not stop.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Pack Instinct
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Passive: When you attack an enemy adjacent to 1+ allied Vestige Caskets, deal +1 damage. If adjacent to 2+ Vestige allies, deal +2 damage instead. **Bloodline Bonus (Fenmar):** Gain +3 damage instead if all adjacent allies are also Fenmar bloodline (pure pack). The pack hunts together.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: Alone we are prey. Together we are apex.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Bloodline Shift
vestige-bloodlines.effect:
Transform into enhanced bloodline form until end of round. Choose based on your primary bloodline:
  - **Fenmar (Wolf)**: +2 movement, Pack Instinct bonuses doubled
  - **Urtok (Bear)**: +3 Defense, regenerate 1 card when hit
  - **Vexis (Chitin)**: +2 Defense, molt reaction (negate 1 attack per round)
  - **Corvath (Raven)**: +3 movement, ignore terrain, can glide
  - **Serrak (Serpent)**: All attacks inflict poison (2 damage next turn), +1 movement
- Can stack multiple shifts. Bloodline evolution.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: Flesh is fluid. Blood is law.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Alpha's Command
vestige-bloodlines.effect: All allied Vestige Caskets within 4 hexes gain +1 damage and +1 movement until end of round. **Bloodline Bonus (Fenmar):** Fenmar allies gain +2 movement instead. The Alpha leads, the pack follows.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: I lead. You follow. We survive.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Feral Rage
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Until end of your turn, your attacks deal +3 damage but you cannot use defense cards or movement cards. Gain 2 Heat. Pure aggression.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: Reason is weakness. Instinct is truth.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Adaptive Evolution
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Play when you take damage. Immediately gain 1 mutation counter. Each mutation counter gives +1 to all attack damage permanently this mission (stacks infinitely). Evolution rewards survival.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: What doesn't kill us makes us deadlier.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Scent of Blood
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Passive: You deal +2 damage to enemies with 15 or fewer cards remaining in their deck. Predators finish wounded prey.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: The smell of death. The taste of victory.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Devouring Maw
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 5 damage. If this kills the target, gain 3 Biomass tokens and recover 2 cards from discard pile. Consume the fallen.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: Flesh sustains flesh. Their death is our strength.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Howl of Remembrance
vestige-bloodlines.effect: All allied Vestige Caskets within 5 hexes immediately move up to 2 hexes toward you. **Bloodline Bonus:** Draw 1 card for each ally that moves (remembering ancestors' tactics). Rally the bloodlines.
vestige-bloodlines.lore: The call of the ancestor. The answer of the heir.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Savage Strike
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 3 damage. Basic melee attack with mutated limbs.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Rending Claws
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 4 damage. If you have Pack Instinct active, deal 5 damage instead.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Leaping Pounce
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Move up to 3 hexes in straight line toward target, then deal 4 damage. Predatory lunge.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Frenzy
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Attack twice for 3 damage each against same target. Gain 1 Heat. Uncontrolled aggression.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Alpha's Bite
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 6 damage. If you have 2+ allied Vestige Caskets adjacent, deal 8 damage instead. Pack leader's fury.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Bloodthirsty Rend
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 5 damage. If this kills the target, immediately make another attack against adjacent enemy for 3 damage. Chain kills.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Regenerative Flesh
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Recover 2 cards from your discard pile. Spend Biomass to heal wounds.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Venomous Spit
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Deal 2 damage. Target takes 2 additional damage at start of their next turn (poison). Toxic adaptation.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Reactive Scales
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Spend 1 Biomass token to reduce by 3 instead. Hardened hide.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Primal Roar
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Target enemy has -1 to their next attack roll. All Vestige allies within 4 hexes gain +1 damage on their next attack. Intimidation and inspiration.

vestige-bloodlines.name: Tracking Scent
vestige-bloodlines.effect: Draw 2 cards. If you have a Prey marked, draw 3 cards instead. Enhanced senses guide the hunt.

wyrd-conclave.name: Bargain Struck
wyrd-conclave.effect: Passive: At start of your turn, gain 1 Bargain token. You may spend Bargain tokens to activate powerful effects (see other cards). Bargain tokens persist across missions (you owe the Fae). Maximum 10 Bargain tokens. Reality's currency.
wyrd-conclave.lore: Everything has a price. Shall we discuss terms?

wyrd-conclave.name: Stolen Face
wyrd-conclave.effect: Choose 1 visible enemy. Look at their hand. Choose 1 card from their hand and copy it into yours (you may play it this turn as if it were yours). That enemy loses that card. If you kill that enemy this mission, permanently gain that card (add to deck between missions). Thievery incarnate.
wyrd-conclave.lore: I will wear your face. I will speak your words. I will BE you.

wyrd-conclave.name: Reality Fracture
wyrd-conclave.effect: Rewind time. Return to start of your turn (restore SP, return hand to state at turn start, undo all actions). Any damage dealt or taken this turn is undone. May only be used once per mission. Temporal violation.

wyrd-conclave.name: Impossible Geometry
wyrd-conclave.effect: Passive: You may move through enemy-occupied hexes (they see a different you, illusion). You may ignore terrain costs (you don't walk, you *step between*). Your movement does not provoke reactions. Space means nothing to us.
wyrd-conclave.lore: Euclidean geometry is a suggestion, not a rule.

wyrd-conclave.name: Fae Bargain
wyrd-conclave.effect: Offer bargain to enemy: "Take 5 damage now, OR give me 3 Bargain tokens and take no damage." Enemy chooses. If they give tokens, you gain 3 Bargain tokens. If they refuse, deal 5 damage and gain "Bargain Breaker" mark on them (+2 damage from all Wyrd attacks permanently). Contracts bind.
wyrd-conclave.lore: Choose. Pain now, or debt forever?

wyrd-conclave.name: Mirror Self
wyrd-conclave.effect: Create illusory duplicate of yourself at your current location. Duplicate has 1 HP, acts on your turn, can move and attack (deals 0 damage, but enemies don't know it's fake). Lasts until destroyed or 3 turns. Enemies cannot tell which is real (you control both). Deception layered.
wyrd-conclave.lore: Which one is me? All of them. None of them.

wyrd-conclave.name: Price Paid
wyrd-conclave.effect: Play when you would die (deck reaches 0). Instead, spend ALL Bargain tokens you have. For each token spent, recover 3 cards from discard pile. If you have 0 tokens, you die normally. Survival has a cost. Always.

wyrd-conclave.name: Shimmer Step
wyrd-conclave.range: Teleport up to 8 hexes, then attack adjacent enemy
wyrd-conclave.effect: Teleport to any hex within 8 hexes (ignore terrain, enemies, obstacles). If adjacent to enemy after teleport, deal 4 damage. Spend 2 Bargain tokens to attack twice (teleport, attack, teleport again, attack again). Impossible positioning.

wyrd-conclave.name: Fae Curse
wyrd-conclave.effect: Deal 2 damage. Place "Fae Curse" on target (lasts until removed). Cursed targets: Draw 1 fewer card each turn (hand size 5 instead of 6). All allies within 3 hexes of cursed target also draw 1 fewer card (curse spreads). Curse removed when target kills a Wyrd unit. Malevolence spreads.
wyrd-conclave.lore: You carry our mark now. It will follow you. It will consume you.

wyrd-conclave.name: Deal with the Devil
wyrd-conclave.effect: Gain 5 Bargain tokens immediately. Draw 3 cards immediately. Next turn, you have 0 SP (cannot act). Alternates each turn: Full SP, then 0 SP, then full SP, etc. Lasts 3 turns total. Mortgage your future.
wyrd-conclave.lore: Power now. Payment later. You'll barely notice.

wyrd-conclave.name: Shimmer Strike
wyrd-conclave.effect: Deal 3 damage. If you have 3+ Bargain tokens, enemy cannot use Reactive cards against this attack (too confused by illusions).

wyrd-conclave.name: Phase Cut
wyrd-conclave.effect: Deal 4 damage. Ignore Defense buffs (attack phases through armor). Gain 1 Bargain token if this kills target (bargain fulfilled).

wyrd-conclave.name: Mirage Assault
wyrd-conclave.effect: Teleport to target, deal 3 damage, teleport back to starting hex. Enemy cannot retaliate (you were never there). Spend 1 Bargain token to attack 2 enemies (teleport to each).

wyrd-conclave.name: Paradox Blade
wyrd-conclave.effect: Deal 6 damage. You also take 2 damage (paradox hurts you too). Spend 2 Bargain tokens to negate self-damage (offload cost to another reality).

wyrd-conclave.name: Stolen Strength
wyrd-conclave.effect: Deal 5 damage. If target has any buffs active (+damage, +Defense, etc.), steal 1 buff (you gain it, they lose it). Lasts until end of round. Thievery again.

wyrd-conclave.name: Incomprehensible Strike
wyrd-conclave.effect: This attack has no fixed range (you choose melee or ranged when played). Enemy must discard 1 random card from hand (confusion effect). Spend 2 Bargain tokens to force discard 2 cards instead. Logic fails.

wyrd-conclave.name: Fae Mirror
wyrd-conclave.effect: Create 1 Mirror Self illusion at your location (see Faction Card "Mirror Self"). Illusion lasts 2 turns or until destroyed. Spend 1 Bargain token to create 2 illusions instead. Multiply confusion.

wyrd-conclave.name: Bargain Siphon
wyrd-conclave.effect: Play when enemy attacks you. Offer bargain: "Miss this attack, give me 2 Bargain tokens." Enemy chooses. If they give tokens, attack misses. If they refuse, attack hits normally. Extortion mid-combat.

wyrd-conclave.name: Shimmer Veil
wyrd-conclave.effect: Become invisible (cannot be targeted by attacks) until your next turn. You may still move and attack (but attacking breaks invisibility). Spend 1 Bargain token to stay invisible even after attacking. Unseen predator.

wyrd-conclave.name: Reality Shard
wyrd-conclave.effect: Throw shard of broken reality. Deal 2 damage. Create "Distortion hex" at impact location (lasts 3 turns). Distortion hexes: Enemies standing in them have -1 to all actions. Allies ignore effect. Warped space.

wyrd-conclave.name: Temporal Loop
wyrd-conclave.effect: Next damage you take this turn is stored in temporal loop. At start of your next turn, choose 1 enemy within 6 hexes - they take that stored damage instead. Redirect pain through time.
